verses.verse: <S%G1492><s%> For We Know <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Earthly <S%G1919><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Tabernacle <S%G4636><s%> Be Destroyed, <S%G2647><s%> A Building <S%G3619><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> We Have, <S%G2192><s%> A House <S%G3614><s%> Not Made With Hands, <S%G886><s%> Eternal <S%G166><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> For Indeed <S%G1063><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> We Groan, <S%G4727><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3613><s%> Our Dwelling <S%G2257><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> To Be Clothed With <S%G1902><s%> Longing; <S%G1971><s%>
If Indeed <S%G1489><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Being Clothed, <S%G1746><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Naked <S%G1131><s%> We Shall Be Found. <S%G2147><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> For Indeed <S%G1063><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Are <S%G5607><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tabernacle <S%G4636><s%> We Groan <S%G4727><s%> Being Burdened; <S%G916><s%> Since <S%G1894><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> We Do Wish <S%G2309><s%> To Be Unclothed, <S%G1562><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> To Be Clothed Upon, <S%G1902><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> May Be Swallowed Up <S%G2666><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mortal <S%G2349><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Life. <S%G2222><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Now He Who <S%G1161><s%> Wrought Out <S%G2716><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G846><s%> This Same Thing Is <S%G5124><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earnest <S%G728><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

Being Confident <S%G2292><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Always, <S%G3842><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Being At Home <S%G1736><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> We Are From Home <S%G1553><s%> Away From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%>

<S%G2292><s%> We Are Confident, <S%G1161><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be Pleased <S%G2106><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> To Be From Home <S%G1553><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Be At Home <S%G1736><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We Are Ambitious, <S%G5389><s%> Whether <S%G1535><s%> Being At Home <S%G1736><s%> Or <S%G1535><s%> Being From Home, <S%G1553><s%> Well Pleasing <S%G2101><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> To Be. <S%G1511><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For All <S%G3956><s%> We <S%G2248><s%> Be Manifested <S%G5319><s%> Must <S%G1163><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judgment Seat <S%G968><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> May Receive <S%G2865><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> The Things Done <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body, <S%G4983><s%> According To <S%G4314><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> He Did, <S%G4238><s%> Whether <S%G1535><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Or <S%G1535><s%> Evil. <S%G2556><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Terror <S%G5401><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> We Persuade, <S%G3982><s%> <S%G2316><s%> But To God <S%G1161><s%> We Have Been Manifested, <S%G5319><s%> <S%G1679><s%> And I Hope <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4893><s%> Your Consciences <S%G5216><s%> To Have Been Manifested. <S%G5319><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> Ourselves <S%G1438><s%> Do We Command <S%G4921><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Occasion <S%G874><s%> Are Giving <S%G1325><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Of Boasting <S%G2745><s%> In Behalf Of <S%G5228><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Have Such <S%G2192><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Appearance <S%G4383><s%> Boasting <S%G2744><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> In Heart. <S%G2588><s%>
<S%G1535><s%> For Whether <S%G1063><s%> We Were Beside Ourselves, <S%G1839><s%> It Was To God; <S%G2316><s%> Or <S%G1535><s%> Are Sober Minded It Is <S%G4993><s%> For You. <S%G5213><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> If The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Constrains <S%G4912><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> Having Judged <S%G2919><s%> This, <S%G5124><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Died, <S%G599><s%> Then <S%G686><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Died; <S%G599><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> He Died, <S%G599><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Live <S%G2198><s%> No Longer <S%G3371><s%> To Themselves <S%G1438><s%> Should Live, <S%G2198><s%> But <S%G235><s%> To Him Who <S%G3588><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Raised Again. <S%G1453><s%>

So That <S%G5620><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Know <S%G1492><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Flesh; <S%G4561><s%> <S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> We Have Known <S%G1097><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Yet <S%G235><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> No Longer <S%G3765><s%> We Know Him. <S%G1097><s%>

So That <S%G5620><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone Be <S%G5100><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ There Is <S%G5547><s%> A New <S%G2537><s%> Creation : <S%G2937><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Old Things <S%G744><s%> Passed Away; <S%G3928><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Have Become <S%G1096><s%> New <S%G2537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All Things : <S%G3956><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> And All Things Are <S%G3956><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Reconciled <S%G2644><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> To Himself <S%G1438><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Service <S%G1248><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Reconciliation : <S%G2643><s%>

How <S%G5613><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ The <S%G5547><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Reconciling <S%G2644><s%> To Himself, <S%G1438><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Reckoning <S%G3049><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3900><s%> Their Offences, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Put <S%G5087><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Reconciliation. <S%G2643><s%>

For <S%G5228><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> We Are Ambassadors, <S%G4243><s%> As It Were <S%G5613><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Exhorting <S%G3870><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> We Beseech <S%G1189><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Be Reconciled <S%G2644><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For Him Who <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Knew Not <S%G1097><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> He Made, <S%G4160><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Might Become <S%G1096><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>
